mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calender(calSubDate, calTransfer, calMaturity, prdID, userID, prdType, calPayment, prdName, calDeposit) VALUES (#{calSubDate}, #{calTransfer}, #{calMaturity},#{prdID}, #{userID}, #{prdType}, #{calPayment}, #{prdName}, #{calDeposit})

choose.when:
SELECT cardId AS prdID, cardName AS prdName, cardDes AS prdDes, cardImgUrl AS prdImg, cardFee AS prdPrice, cardUrl AS prdURL, comCtg AS prdCom FROM cards
WHERE comCtg=#{kindDetail}

SELECT insuId AS prdID, insuName AS prdName, insuJoinURL AS prdURL, prdName AS prdCom, prdLogo AS prdComImg FROM insu
WHERE insuCtg=#{kindDetail}

SELECT savingID AS prdID, comName AS prdCom, prdName AS prdName, maxLimit AS prdPrice FROM savingBase
WHERE comName=#{kindDetail}

SELECT depositID AS prdID, prdName AS prdName, comName AS prdCom, maxLimit AS prdPrice FROM depositBase
WHERE comName=#{kindDetail}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM calender WHERE userID = #{userID} AND calTransfer != 0 ORDER BY calTransfer
SELECT SUM(calDeposit) FROM calender WHERE userID=#{userID};

choose.when: SELECT comCtg FROM cards GROUP BY comCtg
SELECT insuCtg FROM insu GROUP BY insuCtg
SELECT comName FROM savingBase GROUP BY comName
SELECT comName FROM depositBase GROUP BY comName
SELECT cardId AS prdID, cardName AS prdName, cardDes AS prdDes, cardImgUrl AS prdImg, cardFee AS prdPrice, cardUrl AS prdURL, comCtg AS prdCom FROM cards WHERE cardName like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')
SELECT id AS prdID, insuName AS prdName, insuJoinURL AS prdURL, prdName AS prdCom, prdLogo AS prdComImg FROM insu WHERE insuName like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')
SELECT savingID AS prdID, comName AS prdCom, prdName AS prdName, maxLimit AS prdPrice FROM savingBase WHERE prdName like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')
SELECT savingID AS prdID, comName AS prdCom, prdName AS prdName, maxLimit AS prdPrice FROM depositBase WHERE prdName like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')
